K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14a-1: a'arya dzambha la shr'i n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14a-3: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14a-4: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14a-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje lcang lo can gyi gnas dam pa na 'khor gnod sbyin du mas bskor te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-0: de'i @14b tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal la gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-1: sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba de dag zhi ba'i phyir rang gi srog gi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-2: rig sngags khyod kyis ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-3: ngas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-4: de nas gnod 'dzin dpal gyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-5: gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-6: sems can sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-7: rig sngags bdag gis bstan par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-8: sdug bsngal spong zhing bde ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-9: tshogs chen gnyis ni rdzogs 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-10: rang lus bsrung phyir rig sngags 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-11: bzlas shing yongs su gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-12: na ma a'a rya dzambha la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-18: gu nu gu nu; sa pa sa pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-24: tu ma sarba satv'a n'a nytsa sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-26: gsang ba'i bdag po sngags 'di 'don pas skud pa sngon po la lan bdun du sngags kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-27: lan re mdud pa re bor nas dpung pa la bcings na gnod pa med cing dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-28: gu gul tsandan du ru ska //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-29: ka ta ra dang sbyar ba'i sman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:14b-30: de yis mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-2: pa ra ma ka rdu ni ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-3: sarba satva hi ta dzi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-5: na ma: pa ri ya sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-6: sa ma ya a'a karsha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-7: rig sngags 'di lan bdun tshang bar bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-8: de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i snying po gdon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-9: de'ang sngar 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-10: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-11: de'i 'og tu bdag gi ming nas brjod par bgyi na nor rdzas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-12: ci 'dod pa dag 'grub par bgyid cing bde ba stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-13: de nas bdag gi gsang sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di 'don cing yi dam du bgyid na de'i dgos pa ci smos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-14: de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal gyis nyid kyi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dpal phyag na rdo rje la phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-15: na ma a'a rya dzam bha la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-29: ma ma ni da ma aa nanta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-31: a'a rya dzam bha la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15a-33: ma no ra tha pa ri p'u ra k'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-0: de nas gnod sbyin gnod 'dzin dpal gyi 'khor rnams kyis de'i tshe rang rang gi snying po smras @15b pa; aom dza bha la ma ni bha dra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-1: aom dzam bha la purn'a bha dra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-2: aom dzam bha la dha na d'a ta bha dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-3: aom dzam bha la ma h'a dha na d'a ta bha dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-4: aom dzam bha la pi tsi kunda li ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-5: aom dzam bha la ki li m'a li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-6: aom dza bha la mu khen dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-7: aom dzam bha la dza lendra bha dra'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-8: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag pos bk'a stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-9: nor gyi bdag po khyod kyis gang gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-12: klog pa de dag thams cad la yid bzhin du bde ba stsal bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-13: de nas gnod 'dzin gyis gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te lan gsum du bskor ba chos bzhin du byas te 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-002:15b-14: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
